segments.text: have you read the feature article about Oprah Winfrey in this magazine ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: apparently , she's being given an award for donating so much money to charity .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: she's very generous with her money . I think that's because she was poor when she was young .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I heard that she's one of the wealthiest women in the world .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd believe it . She owns magazines , television shows and she has a huge fan base .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you know ; I heard that she was opening a school for underprivileged girls in Africa .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: did they mention that in the article ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes , she's not only building the school , but is also using her own money for the upkeep of the school and to pay the teachers a fair salary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's really commendable . I think more celebrities should use their money to help people like Oprah has .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree . So many celebrities waste their money on sports cars , expensive clothing , and luxurious hotels .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it's amazing how much money they can spend . I heard Britney Spears once spent $ 24,000 a night on a hotel room !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what a waste . It's good to see some stars that are more concerned with charity than status symbols .
segments.speaker: S1
